levels.description: Deals <@ba.vup>{trigger_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to at most <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> Ground enemies within range once every <@ba.vup>{interval}</> seconds and causes targets to <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> for <@ba.vup>{levitate_duration}</> seconds; When a target's <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> effect ends, deals <@ba.vup>{critical_damage_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to all enemies in a small area around that target
